alert.note: Alert for Churchill; Lyon; Storey; Washoe (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 02 at 6:55PM PDT until August 02 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Southwestern Churchill County in west central Nevada... Storey County in western Nevada... Southern Washoe County in western Nevada... North central Lyon County in west central Nevada... * Until 800 PM PDT. * At 654 PM PDT, a dust channel was 12 miles north of Fallon, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than three miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lahontan Reservoir, Fernley, Hazen, Stillwater, Fallon Municipal Airport, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), Desert Peak, Junction U.S 50 And NV 117 (sheckler Cutoff), Fallon Station, Fernley - Tiger Field Airport, Wadsworth, Junction U.S 95 And NV 120 (Pasture Rd), Fernley Sink Near I-80, Battleground Point, and Us 50 At Lyon-Churchill Co Line. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
